trans-unit.source: Data protection
trans-unit.target: Data protection

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to use the DataProtectionProvider class in the Windows.Security.Cryptography.DataProtection namespace to encrypt and decrypt digital data in a UWP app.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to use the DataProtectionProvider class in the Windows.Security.Cryptography.DataProtection namespace to encrypt and decrypt digital data in a UWP app.

trans-unit.source: Data protection
trans-unit.target: Data protection

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to use the [**DataProtectionProvider**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241559) class in the [**Windows.Security.Cryptography.DataProtection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241585) namespace to encrypt and decrypt digital data in a UWP app.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to use the [**DataProtectionProvider**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241559) class in the [**Windows.Security.Cryptography.DataProtection**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241585) namespace to encrypt and decrypt digital data in a UWP app.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data protection APIs in multiple ways:
trans-unit.target: You can use the data protection APIs in multiple ways:

trans-unit.source: To protect data to an Active Directory (AD) security principal like an AD group.
trans-unit.target: To protect data to an Active Directory (AD) security principal like an AD group.

trans-unit.source: Any member of the group can decrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: Any member of the group can decrypt the data.

trans-unit.source: To protect data to the public key contained in an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: To protect data to the public key contained in an X.509 certificate.

trans-unit.source: The owner of the private key can decrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: The owner of the private key can decrypt the data.

trans-unit.source: To protect data by using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: To protect data by using a symmetric key.

trans-unit.source: This works, for example, to protect data to a non-AD principal such as Live ID.
trans-unit.target: This works, for example, to protect data to a non-AD principal such as Live ID.

trans-unit.source: To protect data to the credentials (password) used during logon to a website.
trans-unit.target: To protect data to the credentials (password) used during logon to a website.

trans-unit.source: To protect data, when you create a [**DataProtectionProvider**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241559) object you must specify a protection descriptor before calling [**ProtectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241563) or [**ProtectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241564).
trans-unit.target: To protect data, when you create a [**DataProtectionProvider**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241559) object you must specify a protection descriptor before calling [**ProtectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241563) or [**ProtectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241564).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows possible sample protection descriptors.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows possible sample protection descriptors.

trans-unit.source: Protecting static data
trans-unit.target: Protecting static data

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the [**ProtectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241563) and [**UnprotectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241565) methods to asynchronously protect static data to the current user's SID.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows how to use the [**ProtectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241563) and [**UnprotectAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241565) methods to asynchronously protect static data to the current user's SID.

trans-unit.source: Protecting stream data
trans-unit.target: Protecting stream data

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the [**ProtectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241564) and [**UnprotectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241566) methods to asynchronously protect stream data to the current user's SID.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows how to use the [**ProtectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241564) and [**UnprotectStreamAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br241566) methods to asynchronously protect stream data to the current user's SID.
